PreceptDef.label: improved
PreceptDef.description:
Through careful breeding and care, we strive to improve our cattle. Stronger, healthier, and more productive herds are a testament to our dedication and the cornerstone of a thriving ranch.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Colony cattle will get -15% needed nutrition, +25% eating speed and +15% immunity gain speed.
